scenes.background: Monica, Bob, and you are still in the meeting room discussing ideas.
scenes.description: Monica crosses her arms and says, 'Honestly, I don't think an outdoor activity is the best idea.'

options.text: It's one option, but maybe we need to consider all suggestions equally.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the suggestion, displaying good social skill but moderate perception and self-regulation. Empathy was lower.

options.text: Outdoor activities can be a great way to bond; let's give it a shot.
options.analysis: You showed confidence in the idea, demonstrating good perception and motivation. However, empathy was lower.

options.text: Maybe you're right; we should think about an indoor activity instead.
options.analysis: You showed empathy by acknowledging the concern, but self-regulation and social skill were moderate.
